name: Creeping Dark (Klaas.Driessen)
description:
Creeping Dark is a Survival-Horror game where you, an amateur spelunker, get trapped in an ancient underground temple. 

If you would live, you must find the way out and evade the horror that lurks in the dark.

CONTROLS

WASD to move.

Scroll mouse wheel to cycle through your inventory.

Imported Assets:

  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/realistic-skeleton-and-bone-collection-166829#description
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/humanoids/skeleton-low-poly-202176#description
  • https://www.turbosquid.com/3d-models/3d-stone-rock-1695868#

Final project in my Game Development education at Syntra PXL.
